    • Constructor Detail

      • SunGenerator

        public SunGenerator(int trigger,
            int genAmt,
            Field field)
        Constructor. Registers this object as an observer of Level so that it knows when level increments.
        Parameters:
        trigger - Number of turns between producing sun
        genAmt - Amount of sun produced each time
        field - Field to produce sun to

    • Method Detail

      • generateSun

        public void generateSun()
        If GEN_TRIGGER turns have passed since last producing sunlight, adds GEN_AMT sun to the field. Otherwise, tick cooldowns.

        public void update(java.util.Observable o,
